movie_title: Global warming increases risk of cancer in women: Study: BBC Learning English from the News
introduction: A new scientific study in the Middle East and North Africa has found that rising temperatures increa

vocabulary.definition: to include something as part of a whole
vocabulary.example: Countries in the region must incorporate climate change adaptation strategies into their cancer control plans.

vocabulary.definition: the fact of something existing or being widespread at a particular time or in a particular place
vocabulary.example: The study found that as temperatures rise, cancer prevalence and number of deaths also rise.
Temperatures in the region are expected to rise, exposing more people to climate-related health risks.

vocabulary.definition: to become stronger or more extreme
vocabulary.example: Global heating is intensifying the rise in deadly cancers among women.

vocabulary.definition: information or a story that is passed from one person to another and which may or may not be true
vocabulary.example: The photo of the two actors fueled rumours of their secret affair.

vocabulary.definition: a trick in which someone tries to make people believe something that is not true
vocabulary.example: Trump calls the climate crisis a hoax, denying its existence despite scientific evidence.
